channel.title: Can someone please help me fix this with easyrsc
channel.description:
Hey guys i have a problem with easryrsc that i need fixing.. i have tried. Please don't tell me i need to switch from using easyrsc as that is not what my post is for.
my post is to fix this problem with Easyrsc.
When you log into a client, Logout and then log back in... When you do log back in attack a monster with your fist and at the time you attack the monster click the x in the corner of the client to close it.... Open another client and try to log in until it allows you, When you are allowed to log in then you can use prayer and it will not drain... hits will not go up or down unless you fight something else... if you use potions they will not drain.. all stats are bugged.
If someone can tell me how to fix this or will work this out with me i will appreciate it alot.

item.title: Can someone please help me fix this with easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:10, topic:517845”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=636108.msg4301031#msg4301031 date=1368994844]

[quote author=matty matt link=topic=636108.msg4301013#msg4301013 date=1368990473]

could you help me with where i should look or what file needs fixing. I have looked at both the playerlogins and the player class as all the loading is done in the player class and the player login is not used. also, ive been looking in playerloader with no luck, i would really appreciate the help.
[/quote]No. You shouldn’t be using EasyRSC, as I’ve told you and several others before.

lmao you make me laugh … i try to use moparclassic and i still dont get help there wither its a lose lose lol i try and get a server to be online and cannot. i come here for help and i usually dont get it from you so i do not understand your logic… what is it? you dont want people that cannot code good to be able to have a server up or what because this is how it seems
[/quote]I’ve done all I have time to do for you with MoparClassic… I’ve just finished moving, and I still need to finish some things up before I’ll have some free time. I thought I’d be able to squeeze it in, but I haven’t been able to.

And honestly, I don’t really think people who can’t do anything for themselves should be running a server… Literally the only reason I help you with MoparClassic is because it needs to be done, for the sake of MoparClassic.

ok thanks for being honest. I should just Learn more Java before i even think about running a server, i just like runescape classic.[/quote]

Dont listen to these negative twats, thats all thats in the RSC Community anymore, Start a server, you dont have to be good at coding like all these Dick Blowin Retards around here that have nothing better to do but criticize people.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone please help me fix this with easyrsc

lmao you make me laugh … i try to use moparclassic and i still dont get help there wither its a lose lose lol i try and get a server to be online and cannot. i come here for help and i usually dont get it from you so i do not understand your logic… what is it? you dont want people that cannot code good to be able to have a server up or what because this is how it seems
[/quote]I’ve done all I have time to do for you with MoparClassic… I’ve just finished moving, and I still need to finish some things up before I’ll have some free time. I thought I’d be able to squeeze it in, but I haven’t been able to.

And honestly, I don’t really think people who can’t do anything for themselves should be running a server… Literally the only reason I help you with MoparClassic is because it needs to be done, for the sake of MoparClassic.[/quote]
ok thanks for being honest. I should just Learn more Java before i even think about running a server, i just like runescape classic.

item.title: Can someone please help me fix this with easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:4, topic:517845”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=636108.msg4300322#msg4300322 date=1368891715]
It’s because people in combat are not being logged out, and you’re allowing them to log in twice.
[/quote]
you can do it without attacking anything just logging in and out and in fast… i thought attacking had something to do with it but it doesn’t.[/quote]The same fundamental problem is there… You’re not ensuring that the player is logged out before you let them log in.

Read full topic
